title: A Dragon's Weight in Gold
teaser: For his contributions to Nivion Inc, a golden statue will be built of Kairon. Is this really a token of appreciation, or sweet, golden payback?
summary: Kairon is called back to Nivion Inc on the pretext of making a statue of him to celebrate his contributions. Unfortunately for him, it's a trap that Felix, the CEO, of Nivion Inc, set for him. Kairon is then coated in rubber, plated with gold, then left for the employees of Nivion Inc to use him. Years later, he's forgotten in the storage room, stained with the scent of sweat, cum, and pussy juice.
